org.as2lib.ant
Class Swf.Font

java.lang.Object
  org.as2lib.ant.Swf.Symbol
      org.as2lib.ant.Swf.Font
Enclosing class:
Swf
public static class Swf.Font
extends Swf.Symbol

Font represents a font library symbol to include in the swf.

This task can take the following arguments:

  • id
  • import
  • glyphs
  • include

Author:
Simon Wacker

Method Detail

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the new font family name to use (overriding the original name). This makes it much easier to address fonts from ActionScript and to "unite" font families.

Parameters:
name - the font family name to use
See Also:
the poodleâ€™s kern (sample and explanation by Daniel Fischer)

createInclude

public Swf.Font createInclude()
Creates a new included font if this font instance is used as container.

Returns:
the created included font

public Swf.Font[] getIncludes()
